entry.title: [Global][Baremetal] - efiBootloaderPath mandatory as input for BYOI BOIL
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 5, 11:00 - 11:30 UTC

Jan 7, 15:47 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 05/02/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 05/02/2025 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Starting next month, the EfiBootloaderPath will be required as an input for these templates.
Service improvement : This change will enable customers to customize their EFI bootloader path, if you have any questions or need further clarification, please contact Support.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA6/8][Virtual Private Servers] - Network maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 22, 21:00 UTC  -  Jan 23, 05:00 UTC

Dec 24, 10:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 22/01/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 23/01/2025 05:00 UTC
Service impact : None. Except during the rollback phase (scheduled between 01:00 UTC and 02:00 UTC), access to running Virtual Private Servers instances will not be possible during 1 to 5 mins.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out a network hardware upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters.

The operation is carried out in several steps:

- Step 1: Preparation of the operation (about 3 hours)
- Step 2: New hardware implementation (about 2 hours)
- Step 3: Test and activation of the new hardware (about 2 hours)
We would like to inform you that during the second phase of our upcoming operation, scheduled for between 01:00 and 02:00 UTC, a rollback may be required. In this case, VPS instances will continue to run, but access will be temporarily impacted for a duration of less than 5 minutes.

entry.title: [RBX/WAW/HIL/YYZ/SYD/YNM][Network] - Network equipment operation
entry.content:
Jan 7, 17:48 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational. There has been no impact since 07/01/2025 17:00 UTC

Jan 7, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 2, 15:47 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

Start time : 07/01/2025 06:00 UTC
End time : 07/01/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers may experience latencies during the One Network configuration, which may last for 30 minutes.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform an operation on multiple network equipment.
The intervention on datacenter RBX/WAW will start at 06:00 UTC.
The intervention on datacenter HIL/YYZ will start at 10:00 UTC.
The intervention on datacenter SYD will start at 13:00 UTC.
The intervention on datacenter YNM will start at 16:00 UTC.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS5][Dedicated Servers] - Rack T05E24
entry.content:
Jan 7, 12:04 UTC
Resolved - An incident happened on our Bare Metal offer. It temporarily affected the functionality.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 07/01/2025 09:52 UTC
End time : 07/01/2025 10:20 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack T05E24 were no longer responding.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a equipment related to the electrical infrastructure.

We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. All the servers are now operational.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
